tool.name: GSASII Refinement Stage 1
tool.description: Tool to upload files for neutron powder diffraction analysis in GSASII and perform an initial Rietveld refinement
tool.command:
conda init bash && source ../home/.bashrc && conda activate GSASII && mkdir app && cd app/ && touch $output && mkdir portal && ln -s $cif_file structure.cif && ln -s $gsas_file powder.raw && ln -s $prm_file instrument.prm &&
python $__tool_directory__/gsas2_refinement_upload.py --cif-filename structure.cif --gsas-filename powder.raw --instrument-params-filename instrument.prm --scatter-type $scatter_type --output-directory /portal > >(tee -a $output) 2> >(tee -a $output >&2)
tool.help: A tool to run a GSAS2 Rietveld refinement.
